title: The changes to Caitlyn in 5.8 are broken and unacceptable.
body:
Seriously. is she throwing cleavers now?

Edit: Too bad they fixed it already.

replies.body: That's really good work though.  I'd hit it...
Even when she's gettin' all sadistic?

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Lux,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=00010000,timestamp=2015-05-04T07:19:33.647+0000)
>
> Even when she's gettin' all sadistic?

Especially then. ;)
Actually then she'd hit you lol.

> [{quoted}](name=AtheosisX,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=000100000000,timestamp=2015-05-04T07:26:08.194+0000)
>
> Especially then. ;)

Oh my...you.
Isn't that how she always is? I don't think I've ever heard her say "You're in luck boys, I brought the fuzzy cuffs"
mundo crossdress when he pleases
Dang nabbit, I knew Caitlyn was a sadist when she wouldn't let Jinx have fun.
Jinx just wants to make the world smile, but Caitlyn won't stop ruining the fun.

> [{quoted}](name=Laughing Fish,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=00040000,timestamp=2015-05-04T13:57:44.116+0000)
>
> Jinx just wants to make the world smile, but Caitlyn won't stop ruining the fun.

Cait and Jinx would make a good pair. I always read their _fan comics_, if you know what I mean.

Oh you senpai, you're so kawaiii when you make do- /sudden realization of minors existing in this game/

When you make references like that~
ikr, idk why everyone's in her case while shaco is basically allowed to raom free. He was here first too.
No Jinx just wants to stave off boredom. Caitlyn is stopping her from ruining others' lives for her own selfish enjoyment. /canon
Wow. Mundo got a makeover... he's kinda sexy now.

> [{quoted}](name=Nasreth,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=0007,timestamp=2015-05-04T15:00:22.131+0000)
>
> Wow. Mundo got a makeover... he's kinda sexy now.

What are you talking about? He's always been sexy since release.
{{champion:83}}  Even you get noticed...

{{champion:412}} 
smacks lips

Mundo plastic surgeon
Mundo operate on self
SLUUUUUURP
Mundo want make over. My do look pretty for next match.

> [{quoted}](name=RedCyclone,realm=EUW,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2015-05-04T13:28:38.378+0000)
>
> Mundo plastic surgeon
> Mundo operate on self
> SLUUUUUURP

That's a lot of surgeon done.

You know what else is unacceptable?

Your inability to enable ClearType.

> [{quoted}](name=Jelly Mac,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=0002,timestamp=2015-05-04T07:19:18.151+0000)
>
> You know what else is unacceptable?
> 
> Your inability to enable ClearType.

Ya, that's really gamebreaking. I was wondering why I couldn't read your comment. The text is all blur.
Must be Dr. Mundos visual update finally
damn, she's broken

Mundo goes where he pleases.

And no one wants to know where he goes.
It's the "definitely not mundo" skin.
I thought that was just me. I have been thinking the same darn thing since the update! NERF CAIT!!

> [{quoted}](name=Rand0mH3r0X,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2015-05-04T11:08:08.849+0000)
>
> I thought that was just me. I have been thinking the same darn thing since the update! NERF CAIT!!

Yes, too broken. She's throwing cleave now?
Yea, i noticed this is the patch notes but decided to keep the lols to myself.
Nice shoop there.

1. Why is there a Cait icon?

2. His passive & ult changes are just clarities, not actual buffs.

3. So what's wrong with him having to refund 100% HP on Q-kill?

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-04T07:04:56.883+0000)
>
> 1. Why is there a Cait icon?
> 
> 2. His passive & ult changes are just clarities, not actual buffs.
> 
> 3. So what's wrong with him having to refund 100% HP on Q-kill?

Well...I think my joke is too subtle. Nevermind.

See this for yourself:
http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-58-notes

Your point 1 is the joke.
Riot somehow put Cait as Mundo's icon.

> [{quoted}](name=IS1a442cd69a169ed293a39,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-04T07:06:42.887+0000)
>
> Well...I think my joke is too subtle. Nevermind.
> 
> See this for yourself:
> http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/news/game-updates/patch/patch-58-notes
> 
> Your point 1 is the joke.
> Riot somehow put Cait as Mundo's icon.

Well, you could have just said "The change to **Caitlyn** in 5.8 is broken and unacceptable." The title is a bit misleading to the joke :p

And I just recheck the patch notes, and why didn't I knew Rito made an icon mistake there O.o

> [{quoted}](name=BeatzBoyFTW,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-04T07:11:50.298+0000)
>
> Well, you could have just said "The change to **Caitlyn** in 5.8 is broken and unacceptable." The title is a bit misleading to the joke :p
> 
> And I just recheck the patch notes, and why didn't I knew Rito made an icon mistake there O.o

0.0 You aren't seeing the same mistake I see? That's weird.

ur toaster is breaking gg

I don't see any mistakes either in the Riot post.
My Toaster is just fine

> [{quoted}](name=Treyen,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=I4YfO9pe,comment-id=00000000000000000000,timestamp=2015-05-05T14:50:04.081+0000)
>
> ur toaster is breaking gg
> 
> I don't see any mistakes either in the Riot post.

They just fixed it.
